attributes.action: Act against all MP's who have not abided by the rules laid out in the green book.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We petition the Prime Minister to take disciplinary measures against all MP's who have used rules to gain pecuniary advantage by ignoring the guidelines laid out in the green book and where tax avoidance or mis-claims are revealed, to act without delay to remove the culprits from public service.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament or individual political parties.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
